checkForStringInTabList.name: Check for Name in Tab List
checkForStringInTabList.description: This may be very resource-intensive when having a lot of custom name tags configured, but it ensures that CustomNameTags works on every server like intended. Disabling this might result in better performance, but CustomNameTags will no longer work in the tab list on servers that modify the tab list a ton (for example on Hypixel SkyBlock).

manage.add: Add a new custom Name Tag
manage.name: Minecraft Username

remove.title: Do you really want to remove this entry?
